resources.string: "Drop into battle with a \n hand-held lightning stick for \n an electrifying melee fight."

"Unload on your enemies 
with a volley of missiles
 that can lock onto
 dozens of moving targets
 at once."

" 
Piloted by both Freelancers and Sentinels, this iconic suit's versatility is what makes it deadly.

 With strong offensive capabilities, respectable defense, and something in its arsenal for every situation, the Ranger is the jack-of-all-trades your squad needs."

The Storm channels the raw energy of the Anthem through its seals to hover over the battlefield and dish out damage.

 With its powerful seals and minimal armour, the Storm is a tempestuous javelin that can challenge the skills of even a veteran lancer.
"Blast frozen shards that slowly\n freeze whatever they hit to put\n your opponents on ice."

"Calling down a torrent of 
energy, the Storm decimates a
 targeted area â€“ and any foes 
unlucky enough to be standing
 in it."
Scorch everything in your path with a stream of fire.
Launch an explosive projectile to devastate an area and every enemy inside of it.
Make one of your enemies an easy target by increasing the damage your allies do to them.
Have your enemies feeling the burn with a well-placed bomb that explodes in a burst of acid.

If you think subtlety is overrated and want enough artillery to take out a small army, unleash the pure devastation of this hulking war machine. 

 While each javelin can equip two weapons, the Colossus is the only javelin sturdy enough to wield any of the Heavy Weapons.

The Interceptor excels in getting close to deal damage to enemies, then dashing away before they can react. 

Unleashing lightning-fast maneuverability to pull off powerful offensive abilities, the Interceptor makes the impossible look easy.
This app is not affiliated with Electronic Arts Inc. \"EA\" or Bioware. The app is a fan project developed by \"Ali HammouD\".

Materials used are from the \'Anthem Fan Art Kit\', which is provided by Electronic Arts Inc. \"EA\".\n\n All rights in the Fan Art Kit belong to Electronic Arts Inc. \"EA\", its affiliated companies or licensor.
Special thanks for our graphic designers \"Ali Termos\" and \"Ethan Bridger\" for their efforts and help.

In this page, we will list all the creatures that exist in Anthem. Each creature will have a description that reveals its weaknesses, and indicates how much XP and Gold will be rewarded upon killing it. In addition, we will provide the potential loot drops.
We are working on collecting a various amount of beautiful high quality wallpapers to display your phone!
In the Cortex, we will provide a collection of information regarding the world of Anthem.
Here we will provide an overview of all the active Strongholds, help you engage them, and show you what loot to expect from each.
In the Crafting page, detailed descriptions about each material will be provided. We will help you gather the right resources to craft the item in mind.

On this page, you may be able to login using your EA account to check your in-game stats and progress. Depending on the Api BioWare is going to provide, you will also be able to view a 3D model of your javelins and even customize them!
